title: Publish Beniwal Music Center website permanently with a stable shareable icp0.io link

requirements.text: Deploy the existing Beniwal Music Center app as a permanent (non-draft, non-expiring) Internet Computer canister so the public icp0.io URL remains stable and does not later show “invalid canister” / “Canister ID Not Resolved”.
acceptanceCriteria: A production (non-draft) deployment is created and the resulting icp0.io URL is stable (does not expire).
Visiting the published URL loads the site successfully (HTTP 200) and does not display “invalid canister” / “Canister ID Not Resolved”.
The published site serves the latest frontend build and static assets correctly (e.g., favicon and page assets load without 404 errors).

requirements.text: Provide the final permanent, shareable website link (icp0.io URL) that the user can send to others.

quotes: User: provide me a working link of website which i can sent further

acceptanceCriteria: A single icp0.io link is produced for the permanent deployment and is verified to load the site in a fresh browser session.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new website pages/sections or changing the existing marketing content.
Implementing new backend features or databases.
Adding third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
